title: BINDING POST DUAL RED/BLACK 19MM
blurb:
Dual plastic binding posts with insulated cable entry.
• PT0450 - Blue Deluxe Binding Post with Banana Socket
• PT0451 - Yellow Deluxe Binding Post with Banana Socket
• PT0452 - White Deluxe Binding Post with Banana Socket
• PT0453 - Red Deluxe Binding Post with Banana Socket
• PT0454 - Black Deluxe Binding Post with Banana Socket
• PT0455 - Green Deluxe Binding Post with Banana Socket
